name.description: The name of the DNS Zone. Must be a valid domain name.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

max_number_of_record_sets.description: (Optional) Maximum number of Records in the zone. Defaults to `1000`.

number_of_record_sets.description: (Optional) The number of records already in the zone.

name_servers.description: (Optional) A list of values that make up the NS record for the zone.

create.description: Used when creating the DNS Zone.

update.description: Used when updating the DNS Zone.

read.description: Used when retrieving the DNS Zone.

delete.description: Used when deleting the DNS Zone.
